We’ve been recording GPS traces since 2006 using a variety of tools.

Most recent trails have been recorded on a Garmin Forerunner 205 (Mar 2009 – date), a Nokia 6110 Navigator using Sports Tracker (Aug 2007 – Mar 2009), or via a Sony Ericson, SportsDo and a Globalsat BT338 x-trac bluetooth GPS receiver (Up to Aug 2007)
